inclusion.criterion: All case report forms (CRF) will be kept for the analysis in Feiring Heart Clinic before their introduction to the database electronically.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All CRF's are checked centrally for validity and completeness.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: >= 0.5% for persons under the age of 50 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous cardiovascular disease (CHD ; peripherical atherosclerosis, deep venous thrombosis /pulmonary embolism, congenital heart disease, presence of valvular heart disease).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Lung disease restricting usual physical activity .
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Serious psychological problems (that hinders the participation in the study)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: All kind of disease restricting performing adequate physical activity .
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of cancer shortening drastically survival.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 32-year-old obese woman who came to the clinic with weight concerns. She has sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape.
